English.alert_about: Create, manage, and view the shortcuts that will automatically run via Autocuts as you use your iOS device.
English.alert_donate: Thank you for donating and supporting my Shortcuts development!
English.alert_update_none: You are running the latest version of this shortcut.
English.error_functionStack_empty: No function was defined. Defaulting to
English.error_offline: You must be connected to the internet to perform this action.
English.error_autocut_invalid: This file is not a valid Autocut.
English.prompt_delete: Delete this Autocut? This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt_delete_multiple: Delete the selected Autocuts? This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt_dropboxPath: Path in Dropbox where Autocut entries are located.
English.prompt_donate: Enjoying Autocuts Scheduler? Send me a tip to help fund future development of Autocuts and other shortcuts.
English.prompt_erase_content:
Are you sure you want to delete all Autocuts Scheduler content and settings for this device?

This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt_erase_content2:
Are you ABSOLUTELY SURE you want to delete all Autocuts Scheduler content and settings for this device?

This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt_reset: Reset Autocuts settings or erase all content and settings for Autocuts?
English.prompt_reset_settings:
Are you sure you want to reset Autocuts settings on this device?

None of your content will be affected.
English.prompt_input: Choose data that you would like to send to the shortcut when run.
English.prompt_input_text: Enter text that will be sent to the shortcut. Use tokens {{location}}, {{location_weather}}, {{datetime}}, {{date}}, and {{time}} to insert the current location, weather location, etc. into the Autocut
English.prompt_input_number: Enter a number that will be sent to the shortcut when it runs
English.prompt_input_datetime: Enter a date and time that will be sent to the shortcut when it runs
English.prompt_input_date: Enter a date that will be sent to the shortcut when it runs.
English.prompt_input_time: Enter a time that will be sent to the shortcut when it runs.
English.prompt_input_location: Enter an address that will be sent to the shortcut when it runs
English.prompt_option_schedule: When do you want the Autocut to run?
English.prompt_option_scheduleCustom: Choose a custom date for your Autocut?
English.prompt_option_expiration:
Enter a number (in minutes) that determines how much time can pass before an Autocut expires and will not run.

Enter -1 if you do not want your Autocut to expire after running.
English.prompt_option_device: Do you want to restrict running this Autocut on a particular iOS device?
English.prompt_option_deviceName:
Enter the name of the iOS device on which this Autocut will run.

You can find the device name in Settings > General > About > Name
English.prompt_option_continueInShortcuts:
Run the shortcut in the background or open the Shortcuts app before running?

NOTE: Some shortcuts require the Shortcuts app to be the active application in order to run properly.
English.prompt_autocut_service:
Select the destination for this Autocut.

Choosing a remote destination allows you to run shortcuts automatically on other devices that use Autocuts.
English.prompt_services: Autocut Destinations allow you to create Autocuts locally or on remote iOS devices.
English.prompt_service_new: Select the type of Autocut Scheduling Service to create
English.prompt_service_name: Enter a name for your service
English.prompt_service_dropbox: Enter the path in Dropbox where Autocuts will be stored:
English.prompt_service_ifttt_event: Enter the event name for the IFTTT Webhook:
English.prompt_service_ifttt_apikey: Enter the IFTTT Webhook API Key:
English.prompt_service_zapier: Enter the URL for the Zapier Webhook:
